headline: Bandwidth Costs Around the World
keywords: Bandwidth, Peering, Data Center, Cloudflare Network, Bandwidth Costs, Africa, United States, South America, Europe, Asia, Australia, Oceania, Middle East
description: CloudFlare protects over 4 million Internet properties using our global network which spans 86 cities across 45 countries. Running this network give us a unique vantage point to track the evolving cost of bandwidth around the world.
